last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Picture Show (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Seavers move to Washington, D.C., but share a final meal and memories in the empty house.

name: Growing Pains
overview: Fatherhood has taken on a whole new meaning for Jason Seaver, who has assumed the chores of cooking, cleaning and minding the kids so that his wife, Maggie, can pursue a career in journalism after spending 15 years as a housewife.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Maggie goes back to work as a journalist, prompting psychologist Jason to move his office into their home so he can keep his eye on the kids. Things don't get off to a great start: the first night he gets a call from the police that Mike has been picked up for illegally driving a car.

episodes.name: Springsteen
episodes.overview: Jason embarrasses Mike at a Bruce Springsteen concert when they are interviewed together.

episodes.name: Jealousy
episodes.overview: Jason fumes when Maggie spends long hours on a toxic waste story with handsome co-worker Fred.

episodes.name: Carol's Article
episodes.overview: Maggie gives an honest assessment of Carol's writing of an article for her school magazine; Mike and Ben discover track betting.

episodes.name: Superdad!
episodes.overview: Maggie accuses Jason of monopolizing the children.

episodes.name: Mike's Madonna Story
episodes.overview: Mike's infatuation with a Madonna look-alike worries Maggie.

episodes.name: Weekend Fantasy
episodes.overview: Jason and Maggie want to go to a mountain lodge for a weekend, but are reluctant to leave the kids alone.

episodes.name: Slice of Life
episodes.overview: Coming across a compatibility test in Jason's office, Maggie decides she and Jason should fill it out, but her answers don't tab with his. Meanwhile, Mike feigns interest in karate when his real goal is a girl attending the course.

episodes.name: Carol's Crush
episodes.overview: Carol develops a crush on a family friend, who thinks of her as his little sister.

episodes.name: Dirt Bike
episodes.overview: Mike hurts more than his pride when he takes a nasty fall off a dirt bike that he promised his parents he wouldn't go near.

episodes.name: Standardized Test
episodes.overview: Mike doodles on his aptitude test and winds up with an IQ score of 27.

episodes.name: A Christmas Story
episodes.overview: A depressed department store Santa consulting Jason decides to commit suicide by leaping down the Seavers' chimney.

episodes.name: The Love Song of M. Aaron Seaver
episodes.overview: Mike backs out of the family-bowling match so he can date a snobbish girlfriend.

episodes.name: First Blood
episodes.overview: Jason faces off against Ben's hockey coach, who's teaching the boys to play dirty; Mike learns ballroom dancing.

episodes.name: Slice of Life II
episodes.overview: Maggie casually mentions to Jason that she might be pregnant; Mike acts as a weekend servant to Ben; and Carol wants to divorce her class-project husband.

episodes.name: The Seavers vs. the Cleavers
episodes.overview: The PTA head rejects the Seavers as dance chaperones.

episodes.name: Charity Begins at Home
episodes.overview: Ben gives Jason a very expensive birthday present, causing speculation on how he can possibly afford it.

episodes.name: Reputation
episodes.overview: Mike writes test answers on his shoe soles.

episodes.name: The Anniversary That Never Was
episodes.overview: Maggie's assignment interferes with anniversary plans.

episodes.name: Be a Man
episodes.overview: Custodian Mike watches a wild party explode in his home.

episodes.name: Career Decision
episodes.overview: Reporter Maggie and psychiatrist Jason both face important career decisions.

episodes.name: Extra Lap
episodes.overview: Mike's practical-joker uncle Bob visits from the hereafter.

episodes.name: Jason and the Cruisers
episodes.overview: Maggie plans a surprise reunion for Jason's college rock band.

episodes.name: Fast Times at Dewey High
episodes.overview: A new school year brings boredom, bullies, and romantic mix-ups.

episodes.name: Long Day's Journey Into Night
episodes.overview: A cheerleader befriends Carol solely to meet Mike.

episodes.name: Call Me
episodes.overview: Ben has been calling an X-rated phone service.

episodes.name: Employee of the Month
episodes.overview: Fired Mike hides the truth from his parents.

episodes.name: Dream Lover
episodes.overview: Carol spreads rumors about herself and a "hunk".

episodes.name: Do You Believe in Magic?
episodes.overview: A con man sells Mike a "magic" rock.

episodes.name: Jason's Rib
episodes.overview: A proposed school dress code puts Maggie and Jason at odds.

episodes.name: The Kid
episodes.overview: Ben invites a street girl home for the holidays.

episodes.name: The Breakfast Club
episodes.overview: Grounded liar Mike hears Maggie fibbing to her boss.

episodes.name: Choices
episodes.overview: Carol has the chance to skip a high-school grade.

episodes.name: Higher Education
episodes.overview: A girl raises a grade for Mike, then demands payment.

episodes.name: Some Enchanted Evening
episodes.overview: The winter formal causes opposite problems for Carol and Mike.

episodes.name: Thank You, Willie Nelson
episodes.overview: Maggie's quarreling parents come to visit the Seavers.

episodes.name: Thank God It's Friday
episodes.overview: Mike and his friends go to a college party and have to decide whether to use drugs or not.

episodes.name: My Brother, Myself
episodes.overview: Mike plays Cupid for smitten Ben and his baby sitter.

episodes.name: Jimmy Durante Died for Your Sins
episodes.overview: Carol wants to use radio-contest winnings on a nose job.

episodes.name: Carnival
episodes.overview: Maggie's busy schedule leaves Ben feeling neglected.

episodes.name: The Awful Truth
episodes.overview: A genealogy assignment unearths a dark family secret.

episodes.name: Born Free
episodes.overview: Airlines passengers Jason and Mike must deliver a baby.

episodes.name: The Long Goodbye
episodes.overview: Maggie wants Jason to fire the elderly handyman he hired to fix the furnace, but he refuses because the man is a friend.

episodes.name: Confidentially Yours
episodes.overview: Jason knows the editor offering Maggie a dream job is a notorious womanizer.

episodes.name: Aloha (1)
episodes.overview: The family is stranded in Maui.

episodes.name: Aloha (2)
episodes.overview: Ben videotapes Mike and Carol's Hawaiian romances.

episodes.name: Taking Care of Business
episodes.overview: Mike uses double talk to sell stereos.

episodes.name: Not Necessarily the News
episodes.overview: The family scrambles to help find an out-of-work Maggie a job after she turns into Super Mom, preparing oversize meals and assigning new chores.

episodes.name: Michaelgate
episodes.overview: Mike is unaware that he's been nominated for student-body president because he's "a sure loser."

episodes.name: Big Brother is Not Watching
episodes.overview: Ben asks Carol's advice on getting a new bike from their parents.

episodes.name: A Star is Born
episodes.overview: A star is born when Mike lands a leading role in the school play opposite the lovely Monica.

episodes.name: Gone But Not Forgotten
episodes.overview: Burglars hit the Seaver home.

episodes.name: Who's Zoomin' Who?
episodes.overview: Bobby's annoying habits make Carol look elsewhere for the man of her dreams -- just in time for her to notice a new student.

episodes.name: This is Your Life
episodes.overview: During a tonsillectomy, Ben has an out-of-body experience, dreaming that he escapes with a friendly cabbie, only to find a new Ben has replaced him at home.

episodes.name: Broadway Bound
episodes.overview: After their success in the school play, Mike and Monica set their sights on a Broadway audition for ""Our Town.""

episodes.name: The Scarlet Letter
episodes.overview: An unearned "A" makes Carol doubt her academic record.

episodes.name: A Reason to Live
episodes.overview: A troubled student named Jill (Kellie Overbey) volunteers to work on a school project with Mike (Kirk Cameron) and Boner (Josh Andrew Koenig). This, however, is a subterfuge: Jill has been contemplating suicide due to some very serious problems at home, and she hopes to get some free counseling from Mike's psychiatrist dad Jason (Alan Thicke). But as it turns out, Jason is presently weighed down with a few self-pity issues of his own.

episodes.name: Nasty Habits
episodes.overview: Maggie and Jason try to keep Mike in his room to complete an English paper, but Mike's mind is of course elsewhere.

episodes.name: The Marrying Kind
episodes.overview: Reason flies out the window when Bobby and his parents arrive at the Seavers' for dinner and a special announcement -- that Bobby and Carol are engaged.

episodes.name: State of the Union
episodes.overview: Maggie fumes over the many irritants that seem to be driving her and Jason apart -- until unexpected news sheds light on the situation.

episodes.name: The Mom Who Knew Too Much
episodes.overview: Maggie and Carol share confidences at the beauty salon, but later Carol learns to her chagrin that a secret isn't safe with Maggie.

episodes.name: Great Expectations
episodes.overview: A letter from the girl he met in Hawaii has Mike scheming to fly to Los Angeles to see her without his parents' knowing.

episodes.name: Dance Fever (1)
episodes.overview: At the school dance, Mike gets a girl and Carol gets raked over the coals. Meanwhile, Ben's adventure goes awry.

episodes.name: Dance Fever (2)
episodes.overview: Great expectations turn sour at the Dewey High dance after Mike hears Lydia's voice; and Ben and Stinky find themselves in a seedy diner eyeing a pinball machine that pays real money.

episodes.name: Bringing Up Baby
episodes.overview: The Seavers begin to make room for baby, relegating Ben to the guest quarters and making the others lament the changes bound to come. Meanwhile, Maggie grasps for a way to tell her boss she is pregnant.

episodes.name: The Obscure Objects of Our Desire (1)
episodes.overview: Spring-cleaning breathes new life into the family's household objects, and each has a story to tell (via flashbacks from past episodes).

episodes.name: The Obscure Objects of Our Desire (2)
episodes.overview: Household objects continue to recall occasions in the Seaver home.

episodes.name: How the West Was Won (1)
episodes.overview: Mike and Boner learn that Coach Lubbock has been fired, prompting them to organize a protest.

episodes.name: How the West Was Won (2)
episodes.overview: Jason, Carol, Mike and Boner are arrested in the demonstration over the dismissal of Coach Lubbock.

episodes.name: Graduation Day
episodes.overview: At Mike's high-school graduation, family members recall moments when it seemed like his graduation would never take place.

episodes.name: Fool for Love
episodes.overview: Ben gets spooked at the prospect of asking a girl to a Halloween party; Jason becomes a disruptive force at Lamaze class.

episodes.name: Birth of a Seaver
episodes.overview: Maggie goes into labor on Ben's 12th birthday and Ben confesses to a patient at the hospital that he's already feeling crowded.

episodes.name: Family Ties (1)
episodes.overview: Mike has a showdown with Jason over his rights as an 18-year-old college student, and declares his freedom from parental rule.

episodes.name: Family Ties (2)
episodes.overview: Jason learns his widowed mother has a beau.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner?
episodes.overview: Jason sends his mother on a cruise to get her mind off her dead husband, but when she returns with a fiancé in tow, Jason finds it hard to accept the man who will "replace" his father.

episodes.name: Homecoming Queen
episodes.overview: Carol is chosen for homecoming court.

episodes.name: Nude Photos
episodes.overview: Mike's photography course includes nude studies.

episodes.name: Ben's First Kiss
episodes.overview: Ben throws a party to get to know a girl.

episodes.name: The Nanny
episodes.overview: The Seavers hire a nanny for Chrissy.

episodes.name: Mandingo
episodes.overview: A travel snafu strands Julie with Mike.

episodes.name: In Carol We Trust
episodes.overview: Carol sneaks out of the house for a date.

episodes.name: Mom of the Year
episodes.overview: Maggie prepares her "Working Mother of the Year" acceptance speech.

episodes.name: Semper Fidelis
episodes.overview: Boner flunks out of college and joins the Marines.

episodes.name: Feet of Clay
episodes.overview: Maggie arranges for Ben to meet his favorite rock musician.

episodes.name: Anniversary from Hell
episodes.overview: Guests bicker at the Seavers' 20th-anniversary party.

episodes.name: Fortunate Son
episodes.overview: When Mike takes a job at a convenience store, his mother is worried about him working the dangerous night shift; but Mike is more concerned about the favoritism his racist boss shows him as one of the few white employees.

episodes.name: Double Standard
episodes.overview: Jason punishes Carol and Ben unequally for the same offense when they are both caught after sneaking out for dates without permission.

episodes.name: The Recruiter
episodes.overview: Carol doesn't want to attend her parents' alma mater.

episodes.name: Show Ninety -- Who Knew?
episodes.overview: Jason intervenes when Mike gets bad grades in psychology.

episodes.name: Second Chance
episodes.overview: Carol's boyfriend is injured drinking and driving.

episodes.name: The Looooove Boat (1)
episodes.overview: Jason's mother plans to wed aboard a cruise ship.

episodes.name: The Looooove Boat (2)
episodes.overview: Jason tries to mend his mother's broken wedding plans.

episodes.name: Anger With Love
episodes.overview: Maggie opposes Mike and Julie's wedding plans.

episodes.name: Mike and Julie's Wedding
episodes.overview: Julie and Mike suffer prenuptial jitters.

episodes.name: Carol Meets the Real World
episodes.overview: Jason tells Carol to get a job.

episodes.name: Fish Bait
episodes.overview: His drama teacher and classmates intimidate Mike.

episodes.name: Teach Me
episodes.overview: Carol brings a bogus boyfriend to a family party.

episodes.name: Carol's Papers
episodes.overview: An angry Jason confronts Ben and Mike, who gives conflicting versions of how Ben came to sell Carol's old term papers to students at Dewey High -- and to date a seductive 18-year-old.

episodes.name: Coughing Boy
episodes.overview: Mike is over the moon when he attends an open casting session and wins a part on a TV cop show -- and crushed when his single line is cut in the editing.

episodes.name: The New Deal (1)
episodes.overview: Jason gets a promising job offer.

episodes.name: The New Deal (2)
episodes.overview: Jason can't tell Maggie about the job offer.

episodes.name: Paper Route
episodes.overview: Ben assumes Mike's paper route for half the money.

episodes.name: Five Grand
episodes.overview: Their grandparents give Mike, Carol and Ben $5,000 each.

episodes.name: Carol's Promotion
episodes.overview: Promoted at work, Carol decides against college.

episodes.name: Ben and Mike's Excellent Adventure
episodes.overview: Mike takes Ben girl chasing.

episodes.name: The Triangle
episodes.overview: Mike falls for his leading lady.

episodes.name: The Return of the Triangle
episodes.overview: David turns to Mike for help with Kate.

episodes.name: The Home Show
episodes.overview: The Seavers' reception to raise money for a free mental-health clinic spells disaster when they forget the date of the party and must scramble at the last minute for a caterer.

episodes.name: Jason vs. Maggie
episodes.overview: Ben asks permission to get his ear pierced, which leads to a serious argument between his parents.

episodes.name: Mike, Kate and Julie
episodes.overview: While on a Valentine's Day dinner date with Kate, Mike runs into Julie at the restaurant.

episodes.name: Mike, the Teacher
episodes.overview: Mike goes to work as a substitute teacher.

episodes.name: Carol in Jail
episodes.overview: Carol lands in jail after a minor traffic violation.

episodes.name: Future Shock (a.k.a. Maggie's Dream)
episodes.overview: Chrissy becomes a teenager in Maggie's dream, which is influenced by her fear of being an older parent in a sea of youngsters taking their kids to preschool.

episodes.name: Cheating (a.k.a. Ben Cheat's)
episodes.overview: Ben weighs the pros and cons of cheating after he learns the tricks of the test-passing trade from sly schoolmate Vito.

episodes.name: Mike the Director
episodes.overview: In a moment of introspection as he prepares to graduate, Mike wrestles with self-doubt about his ability as a director.

episodes.name: Weekend at Mike's
episodes.overview: With Jason's wallet missing, the Seavers must rely on others to provide them with room and board while their house is being fumigated.

episodes.name: Ben's Movie
episodes.overview: Ben casts a girl he likes as the lead in his home movie.

episodes.name: Where There's a Will
episodes.overview: Jason and Mike head off together to inspect the mountain cabin Jason has inherited from his Uncle George.

episodes.name: Mike's Choice
episodes.overview: When Mike lands a role in an off-Broadway play, he leaves college to pursue acting full-time in New York City.

episodes.name: Midnight Cowboy
episodes.overview: Mike is broke and homeless in New York City.

episodes.name: Roommates
episodes.overview: Mike becomes roommates with sister Carol, now a Columbia University student.

episodes.name: Daddy Mike
episodes.overview: Mike and his friend Eddie schemingly join "Parents Without Mates" to meet women.

episodes.name: Ben's Sure Thing
episodes.overview: At the school's Parents Night, the Seavers learn Ben's been telling his friends that the girl he's dating is promiscuous.

episodes.name: Jason Flirts, Maggie Hurts
episodes.overview: A flirty Jason gets jealous when Maggie turns the tables.

episodes.name: Happy Halloween (1)
episodes.overview: The Seavers spend a rainy Halloween night telling ghost stories.

episodes.name: Happy Halloween (2)
episodes.overview: The Seavers spend a rainy Halloween night telling ghost stories.

episodes.name: Let's Go Europe (1)
episodes.overview: Jason buys an anniversary trip to Paris from travel agent Mike, who himself wins a European tour that falls apart; Maggie, in Paris, is struck with appendicitis.

episodes.name: Let's Go Europe (2)
episodes.overview: Maggie is hospitalized in Paris, while Mike finds himself stuck on the road with an angry customer.

episodes.name: Let's Go Europe (3)
episodes.overview: Mike and Amy continue to bicker their way toward Paris.

episodes.name: Divorce Story
episodes.overview: Jason, happy to see his mother's second marriage crumbling, doesn't want to provide her with professional help.

episodes.name: The World According to Chrissy
episodes.overview: Chrissy starts spending much time with her imaginary friend, a six-foot-tall mouse named Ike.

episodes.name: How Could I Leave Her Behind?
episodes.overview: Mike's friend Eddie shows up for a double date with Mike's ex-girlfriend.

episodes.name: Like Father, Like Son
episodes.overview: An an intrafamily communications seminar, Mike and Jason discover just how alike they are.

episodes.name: Ben's Rap Group
episodes.overview: Jason becomes Ben's business partner in the management of a rap group, but uses the money he's invested to control Ben.

guest_stars.character: Rapper in Fresh Kid's Music Group (uncredited)
guest_stars.name: Brian Austin Green

episodes.name: Eddie, We Hardly Knew Ye
episodes.overview: Maggie's dad drops in for an unexpected visit, with news of his imminent death.

episodes.name: Maggie Seaver's: The Meaning of Life
episodes.overview: Jason takes Maggie on a tropical getaway to lift her spirits after her father's death, trusting Chrissy to Mike and Carol.

episodes.name: All the World is a Stage
episodes.overview: Mike competes with a well-established actor for a role in a soap opera, learning how tenuous an acting career can be.

episodes.name: Not With My Carol You Don't
episodes.overview: Though Jason had an insensitive Carol pitch in at the clinic, he objects to her dating an ex-con she meets there.

episodes.name: Meet the Seavers
episodes.overview: In an homage to The Twilight Zone, Ben awakens to discover he's Jeremy Miller, an actor on the set of ""Meet the Cleavers"".

episodes.name: Carol's Carnival
episodes.overview: On a blind date shaping up as a disaster, Carol goes to the carnival, and finds unexpected fun and excitement.

episodes.name: Home Schooling
episodes.overview: Maggie teaches Ben at home after he is suspended from school.

episodes.name: Viva Las Vegas
episodes.overview: Mike and Kate accompany the eloping Eddie and a hat-check bimbette to Las Vegas, giving Mike and Carol the wrong idea.

episodes.name: Back to School
episodes.overview: Mike teaches at an urban high school.

episodes.name: Stop, Luke, and Listen
episodes.overview: Mike gets involved when he learns his prize pupil Luke is homeless.

episodes.name: In vino veritas
episodes.overview: Mike persuades Jason and Maggie to let Luke stay with them temporarily; then Jason's wine cellar goes missing.

episodes.name: Paper Tigers
episodes.overview: Jason and Maggie compete to write a newspaper column; Ben hates his glasses.

episodes.name: The Young and the Homeless
episodes.overview: Mike gears up for his big day as a TV soap opera star just as Luke gears up to move out of the Seavers'.

episodes.name: Jason Sings the Blues
episodes.overview: Luke is afraid to visit the doctor, so Jason accompanies him -- but it's Jason who turns out to need surgery.

episodes.name: The Kid's Still Got It
episodes.overview: Carol accompanies Maggie to a resort, which turns out to be hosting a singles convention; meanwhile, the all-male weekend planned at home is ruined when Chrissy is set home with head lice.

episodes.name: There Must Be a Pony
episodes.overview: Nouveau riche neighbors move in next door; Ben is forced to look after Luke on his first day of high school; Jason's scheme to let Chrissie stay up late backfires when the neighbors throw a lavish party.

episodes.name: The Big Fix
episodes.overview: Consumer advocate Maggie raps a vacuum cleaner that Ben broke without telling her.

episodes.name: Home Malone
episodes.overview: The ghost of Maggie's father oversees the Seavers' visit to her childhood home.

episodes.name: Bad Day Cafe
episodes.overview: While Jason and Maggie are away, the principal informs Mike that Luke's birth father is back in town -- and wants him back.

episodes.name: B=MC2
episodes.overview: Ben crams for a college entrance exam, but gets no help from Jason.

episodes.name: It's Not Easy Being Green
episodes.overview: Christmas brings anger and angst to the Seavers.

episodes.name: The Call of the Wild
episodes.overview: Penniless Mike schemes to give Kate a skiing trip.

episodes.name: Honest Abe
episodes.overview: Luke's homeless friend steals a Seaver momento.

episodes.name: Vicious Cycle
episodes.overview: Maggie and Jason put Mike on the spot for Luke's curfew problems.

episodes.name: Ménage à Luke
episodes.overview: A love triangle involves Ben, Luke and a classmate.

episodes.name: The Five Fingers of Ben
episodes.overview: Tired of being bullies, Ben takes karate lessons.

episodes.name: Don't Go Changin'
episodes.overview: Mike thinks his friend is a bad influence on Luke.

episodes.name: The Truck Stops Here
episodes.overview: Luke's father George visits the Seavers hoping that Luke has mellowed a little and would like to spend some time with him but Luke doesn't. He was about to leave when he collapses outside the door. He says that can't move, so they take him in. Jason and Ben offer to deliver his load, and they experience all sorts of chaos on the way. Mike thinks that George is faking his injury so that he could stay and Luke would have to talk to him. But the doctor tells Maggie who tells Mike that unless George stops driving trucks, he could become paralyzed. Mike talks to George and tells him to tell Luke but doesn't want Luke to pity him and doesn't anything else to do but be a trucker. Mike suggests that maybe he could open a truck stop. Luke finds George struggling to get up and they finally talk. The next day after Jason and Ben return, George tells them that he is giving up trucking and will open a truck stop and Luke's going with him. Luke says goodbye to the Seavers.

episodes.name: Maggie's Brilliant Career
episodes.overview: Maggie wants to fulfill a dream by climbing a mountain.

episodes.name: The Wrath of Con Ed
episodes.overview: A power failure causes dissensions in the Seaver household.

episodes.name: The Last Picture Show (1)
episodes.overview: Maggie is offered a plum job in Washington, D.C.

episodes.name: The Last Picture Show (2)
episodes.overview: The Seavers move to Washington, D.C., but share a final meal and memories in the empty house.
